name: Kerim Erden
coverLetter: Hey there, my name is Kerim, I am almost 21 years old, I have grown my own plants, trimmed them, and absolutely love the hell out of working with mariquana and the whole entire culture behind it. I am sending this letter to you today because i'm fiercly determined to be a trimmer, to go into the mariquana work field and to learn something out of it.
